roleset.name: be hostile towards, inciting hostility in the target
roleset.note: ANTAGONIZE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from antagonize.01-v)
ANTAGONISTIC-J NOTES: Roleset based on BOLT P01. Comparison toantagonize.01, which maps to VN class 31.1. (from antagonistic.01-j)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Whatever the outcome of a test case [*T*-4] , President Bushwould have [*-2]to move cautiously becase the very attempt would ``antagonize not just Democrats but Republicans , '' says [*T*-3] Louis Fisher , a scholar at the Congressional Research Service who[*T*-1] specializes in executive-legislative relations .

example.name: All args
example.text: If elections were held their , or if there was a struggle for power , the regime that would arise would be friendly with Iran andextremely antagonistic to the U.S. : quite understandably I mightadd .
example.arg: If elections were held their , or if there was a struggle for power ,

roleset.name: diametrically oppose, neutralizing each other's effect
roleset.note: ANTAGONIZE-V NOTES: ANTAGONISTIC-J NOTES:This lemma has been reframed following negotiations betweenMartha, Julia, Tim, Katie and Ulf. The former frame contained asingle roleset for all usages. The new frame splits volitional fromnon-volitional subjects, and experiencer from non-experiencing objects

example.name: antagonize-v: both args
example.text: Sodium selenite antagonizes sodium arsenite-induced chromosomal aberrations and sister chromosome exchanges in humanlymphocytes.
example.arg: sodium arsenite-induced chromosomal aberrations and sister chromosome exchanges

example.name: antagonistic-j: both args
example.text: To achieve the project objective, it is vital to find a way to isolate and estimate the functional group that-1 *T*-1 is antagonistic toR. solani AG 1.
